title: Professional Negotiation Skills
description: Navigate customer requests, rate discussions, and conflict resolution professionally

vocabulary.context: Fair and sensible request or offer

phrases.english: I understand your request, but I need to follow platform policies
phrases.spanish: Entiendo su solicitud, pero debo seguir las políticas de la plataforma
phrases.pronunciation: en-tee-EN-doh soo soh-lee-see-TOOD, PEH-roh DEH-boh seh-GEER lahs poh-LEE-tee-kahs deh lah plah-tah-FOR-mah

phrases.english: Let's find a solution that works for both of us
phrases.spanish: Busquemos una solución que funcione para ambos
phrases.pronunciation: boos-KEH-mohs OO-nah soh-loo-see-ON keh foon-see-OH-neh PAH-rah am-BOHS

That's outside of what I can provide

phrases.english: I need to maintain my service standards
phrases.spanish: Necesito mantener mis estándares de servicio
phrases.pronunciation: neh-seh-SEE-toh man-teh-NER mees es-TAN-dah-rehs deh ser-VEE-see-oh

culturalNotes.note: Americans appreciate clear, direct statements of what you can and cannot do
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: More direct than Colombian indirect communication style

culturalNotes.note: It's acceptable and expected to set clear limits on services while remaining polite
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: US culture supports saying 'no' professionally; not seen as rude

culturalNotes.note: Focus on solutions and alternatives rather than problems or excuses
culturalNotes.colombianComparison: Action-oriented approach valued over relationship-focused explanations

practicalScenarios.situation: Customer asks you to exceed speed limit
practicalScenarios.spanishResponse: Entiendo que tiene prisa, pero por su seguridad y la mía, debo respetar los límites de velocidad. Haré todo lo posible por tomar la ruta más rápida.
practicalScenarios.englishTranslation: I understand you're in a hurry, but for your safety and mine, I must respect speed limits. I'll do everything possible to take the fastest route.
practicalScenarios.tips: Acknowledge their need while maintaining safety boundaries

practicalScenarios.spanishResponse: Para protección de ambos, todos los pagos deben procesarse a través de la aplicación. Es una política de la plataforma que debo seguir.
practicalScenarios.englishTranslation: For both our protection, all payments must be processed through the app. It's a platform policy I must follow.
practicalScenarios.tips: Reference platform policy for support in declining

practicalScenarios.situation: Customer wants extra stops not in app
practicalScenarios.spanishResponse: Con mucho gusto puedo agregar paradas, pero necesito que las añada en la aplicación para que el costo y el tiempo se calculen correctamente.
practicalScenarios.englishTranslation: I'm happy to add stops, but I need you to add them in the app so the cost and time are calculated correctly.
practicalScenarios.tips: Offer solution that follows proper procedures

practicalScenarios.spanishResponse: He esperado [X] minutos. ¿Podría iniciar el viaje en la aplicación para que se registre el tiempo de espera?
practicalScenarios.englishTranslation: I've waited [X] minutes. Could you start the trip in the app so the wait time is recorded?
practicalScenarios.tips: Politely request proper compensation for waiting
